title: Literally a Map Showing All the Buildings in the World
description: Well, here's something you don't see every day: all 2.75 billion buildings of the world shown together in a single 3D map.
content:
The world has a lot of buildings. Now you can see them all with a single glance.
A research team at the Technical University of Munich (TUM) in Germany published the GlobalBuildingAtlas, a high-reso… [+3494 chars]
